name: Little Dentist Clinic - kids teeth shave games for boys and girls
name_original: Little Dentist Clinic - kids teeth shave games for boys and girls
description:
Little Dentist Clinic!

How crazy is the dentist, you can come to try it
Every kid want to be a nice doctor, and it's your dream. Yes? Now you get a chance to treat the real patients, you want more enjoy this! Become the best doctor in town and perform different treatments on your patients. Extract their teeth carefully without hurting them and see a tooth fairy swirl her magic wand. Treat patients at the office with crazy cool doctor tools like mouth spray, dental pliers and braces! Brush dirty teeth, pull teeth, fight bacteria, style & straighten teeth with braces and so much more! Removing decay and placing fillings, cleanings do remove all the seeds from the mouths of your patients.
Don't be scare of visiting a virtual dentist. Be a super cool dentist and lets destroy germs and cavities by picking the best tools to treat your little baby patients. Gain experience to become the expert dentist doctor and unlock more patients.

Here you can not only turn yourself into a professional dentist, diagnose and cure different patients, but also can operate and decorate your own dental clinic, make it your dreaming one.
